title: Shinobu-Chan Wants To Get Closer
description:
Description :
        Shinobe Shinobu, a shy and kind-hearted high school girl who is also a descendant of the K?ga ninja clan, finds herself drawn to Iga-kun, a transfer student from the rival Iga village.Thus begins a romantic comedy filled with ninja antics and adolescent awkwardness: The Teenage Ninja Scroll of Love!
